TheKombatant:attAcidSlide.NAME: Acid Slide
TheKombatant:attAcidSlide.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! thekombatant:Mixup damage. NL Apply !M! Poison. NL thekombatant:EX: Gain 1 [E].

TheKombatant:attColdEncounter.NAME: Kold Encounter
TheKombatant:attColdEncounter.DESCRIPTION: thekombatant:Kombo NL Deal !D! damage. You may play another thekombatant:Kombo.
TheKombatant:attColdEncounter.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: thekombatant:Kombo NL Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! thekombatant:Chilled. You may play another thekombatant:Kombo.

TheKombatant:attTouchofRain.NAME: Touch of Rain
TheKombatant:attTouchofRain.DESCRIPTION: thekombatant:Kombo NL Deal !D! thekombatant:Mixup damage. NL Draw !M! Kard. NL Discard !M! Kard.

TheKombatant:attUppercut.NAME: Uppercut
TheKombatant:attUppercut.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Weak. thekombatant:Extender.

TheKombatant:attRisingThunder.NAME: Rising Thunder
TheKombatant:attRisingThunder.DESCRIPTION: thekombatant:Kombo NL Deal !D! damage to 2 random enemies. NL Meter gain from this Kard is Doubled.
TheKombatant:attRisingThunder.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: thekombatant:Kombo NL Deal !D! damage to 2 random enemies. NL Meter gain from this Kard is Tripled.

TheKombatant:attPosessed.NAME: Possessed
TheKombatant:attPosessed.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Whenever you play a thekombatant:Kombo this turn, Draw !M! Kard.

TheKombatant:attFlamePort.NAME: Flame Port
TheKombatant:attFlamePort.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! thekombatant:Toasty and deal !D! damage to ALL Enemies. NL thekombatant:Extender. Exhaust. NL thekombatant:EX: This kard isn't Exhausted.

TheKombatant:attRoundhouse.NAME: Roundhouse
TheKombatant:attRoundhouse.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Put 1 Roundhouse from your draw pile to your hand. NL It's damage is increased by !M! for this combat.

TheKombatant:attWeWin.NAME: We Win
TheKombatant:attWeWin.DESCRIPTION: thekombatant:Kombo NL Deal !D! damage to an enemy twice. NL [#F4D03F]Special[] thekombatant:Cancel.

TheKombatant:attElderStorm.NAME: Elder Storm
TheKombatant:attElderStorm.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to an enemy !M! times. NL thekombatant:EX: Increase the number of hits by 1 this combat.

TheKombatant:attIceSlide.NAME: Ice Slide
TheKombatant:attIceSlide.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL thekombatant:EX: Apply !M! thekombatant:Chilled to ALL enemies.

TheKombatant:attFrostBitten.NAME: Frost Bitten
TheKombatant:attFrostBitten.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage.  NL Deals bonus damage to ALL enemies based upon target's thekombatant:Chilled. NL [#F4D03F]Special[] thekombatant:Cancel.

TheKombatant:attSheddingSkin.NAME: Shedding Skin
TheKombatant:attSheddingSkin.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Apply !M! Poison. NL thekombatant:EX: Gain !B! Block.

TheKombatant:attThrow.NAME: Throw
TheKombatant:attThrow.DESCRIPTION: Enemy loses !D! HP. NL If the target was planning to attack, gain !B! Block.

TheKombatant:attGodsRage.NAME: God's Rage
TheKombatant:attGodsRage.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy. NL Discard a kard. Draw !M! kard.
TheKombatant:attGodsRage.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy. NL Discard a kard. Draw !M! kards.

TheKombatant:attArcticAssault.NAME: Arctic Assault
TheKombatant:attArcticAssault.DESCRIPTION: thekombatant:Kombo NL Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! thekombatant:Chilled.

TheKombatant:attCurse.NAME: Kurse
TheKombatant:attCurse.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage for each attack played this turn. NL

TheKombatant:attCertainDeath.NAME: Certain Death
TheKombatant:attCertainDeath.DESCRIPTION: thekombatant:Kombo NL Deal !D! damage. Discard !M! kards. Deal half that damage again.
TheKombatant:attCertainDeath.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: thekombatant:Kombo NL Deal !D! damage. Discard !M! kard. Deal half that damage again.

TheKombatant:attDamnation.NAME: Damnation
TheKombatant:attDamnation.DESCRIPTION: thekombatant:Kombo NL Deal !D! damage. NL If the target has thekombatant:Toasty, [#F4D03F]Special[] thekombatant:Cancel.

TheKombatant:attSwampStrikes.NAME: Swamp Strikes
TheKombatant:attSwampStrikes.DESCRIPTION: thekombatant:Kombo NL Deal !D! damage. NL If the target has Poison, apply !M! Vulnerable.
TheKombatant:attSwampStrikes.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: thekombatant:Kombo NL Deal !D! damage. NL If the target has Poison, apply !M! Vulnerable and thekombatant:Extender.

TheKombatant:attFlyingThundergod.NAME: Flying Thunder God
TheKombatant:attFlyingThundergod.DESCRIPTION: thekombatant:EX: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.
TheKombatant:attFlyingThundergod.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: I'm too nice to take 3 Energy away for trying to do that.

TheKombatant:attGodFist.NAME: God Fists
TheKombatant:attGodFist.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to !M! random enemies. Each hit gains an additional 2 [#F4D03F]Meter[].

TheKombatant:attFaceEater.NAME: Face Eater
TheKombatant:attFaceEater.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Gain !M! Temporary HP. NL Exhaust.

TheKombatant:attFannado.NAME: Fannado
TheKombatant:attFannado.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the next played kard is a regular Attack, refund it's [E] cost.

TheKombatant:attGravedigger.NAME: Gravedigger
TheKombatant:attGravedigger.DESCRIPTION: thekombatant:Kombo NL Deal !D! damage twice. Return a Special from your discard to your hand.
TheKombatant:attGravedigger.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: thekombatant:Kombo NL Deal !D! damage twice. Return a Special from your discard to your hand. NL [#F4D03F]Special thekombatant:Cancel.

TheKombatant:attWhiteLightning.NAME: White Lightning
TheKombatant:attWhiteLightning.DESCRIPTION: thekombatant:Kombo NL Deal !D! damage. Gain !M! extra [#F4D03F]Meter.
TheKombatant:attWhiteLightning.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: thekombatant:Kombo NL Deal !D! damage. Gain !M! extra [#F4D03F]Meter. NL thekombatant:Extender.

TheKombatant:attYouSuck.NAME: You Suck!
TheKombatant:attYouSuck.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Lose !M! HP. Exhaust.

TheKombatant:skillIceBall.NAME: Ice Ball
TheKombatant:skillIceBall.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! thekombatant:Chilled. NL thekombatant:EX: Convert half of all thekombatant:Chilled on the target to lost Strength.
TheKombatant:skillIceBall.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! thekombatant:Chilled. NL thekombatant:Extender. NL thekombatant:EX: Convert half of all thekombatant:Chilled on the target to lost Strength.

TheKombatant:attRekindle.NAME: Rekindle
TheKombatant:attRekindle.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! thekombatant:Mixup damage. Shuffle this kard into your draw pile. NL Draw 1 Kard.

TheKombatant:attSoulBall.NAME: Soul Ball
TheKombatant:attSoulBall.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. You may play a thekombatant:Kombo NL thekombatant:EX: thekombatant:Extender.

TheKombatant:attSoulChoke.NAME: Soul Choke
TheKombatant:attSoulChoke.DESCRIPTION: thekombatant:Kombo NL Deal !D! damage. NL thekombatant:EX: Gain half the damage dealt as Temporary Health.

TheKombatant:attColdBlooded.NAME: Kold Blooded
TheKombatant:attColdBlooded.DESCRIPTION: thekombatant:Kombo NL Deal !D! damage. NL Deals !M! additional damage for every Poison or thekombatant:Chilled on the target.

TheKombatant:attBicycleKick.NAME: Bicycle Kick
TheKombatant:attBicycleKick.DESCRIPTION: thekombatant:Kombo NL Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL thekombatant:EX: Deal !D! damage !M! additional times.

TheKombatant:attShortHop.NAME: Short Hop
TheKombatant:attShortHop.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! thekombatant:Mixup damage. NL Draw !M! Kards.
TheKombatant:attShortHop.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! thekombatant:Mixup damage. NL Draw !M! Kards.

TheKombatant:attTeleslam.NAME: Teleslam
TheKombatant:attTeleslam.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage twice. NL If played with [#F4D03F]Special thekombatant:Cancel, deal !D! damage again. Exhaust. NL thekombatant:EX: This kard isn't Exhausted.

TheKombatant:attFatality.NAME: Fatality
TheKombatant:attFatality.DESCRIPTION: thekombatant:Kombo NL Deal !D! damage. If Fatal, heal !M!. NL Exhaust.

TheKombatant:pwrSmokescreen.NAME: Smokescreen
TheKombatant:pwrSmokescreen.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a thekombatant:Kombo, gain !M! Block.

TheKombatant:pwrDrunkenFist.NAME: Drunken Fist
TheKombatant:pwrDrunkenFist.DESCRIPTION: Increases the power of thekombatant:Mixup damage attacks by !M!.

TheKombatant:pwrToxicAir.NAME: Toxic Aura
TheKombatant:pwrToxicAir.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, apply !M! Poison to a random enemy.

TheKombatant:pwrSecretShang.NAME: Secret Shang Tsung
TheKombatant:pwrSecretShang.DESCRIPTION: At the beginning of your turn, alternate between gaining !M! Strength and !M! Dexterity.

TheKombatant:pwrTarkatanRage.NAME: Tarkatan Rage
TheKombatant:pwrTarkatanRage.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you lose Health, gain !M! Plated Armor.

TheKombatant:pwrMeatandGreet.NAME: Meat and Greet
TheKombatant:pwrMeatandGreet.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you end your turn without playing a Skill, Heal !M! HP.

TheKombatant:pwrEtherealSais.NAME: Ethereal Sais
TheKombatant:pwrEtherealSais.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play !M! thekombatant:Kombos in a turn, thekombatant:Extender. NL This effect cannot stack.

TheKombatant:pwrHatTricks.NAME: Hat Tricks
TheKombatant:pwrHatTricks.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal NL Using thekombatant:Extender draws 1 additional kard.

TheKombatant:pwrElderGodsCouncil.NAME: Consult Elder Gods
TheKombatant:pwrElderGodsCouncil.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, draw !M! additional kard, Gain 10% Meter, Refund the cost of the first !M! Kard played.
TheKombatant:pwrElderGodsCouncil.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, draw !M! additional kards, Gain 20% Meter, Refund the cost of the first !M! Kards played.

TheKombatant:skillDarkness.NAME: Darkness
TheKombatant:skillDarkness.DESCRIPTION: thekombatant:Kombo NL Gain !B! Block. Draw !M! kard.
TheKombatant:skillDarkness.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: thekombatant:Kombo NL Gain !B! Block. NL Shuffle a kard from your Discard into your Draw Pile. Draw !M! kard.

TheKombatant:skillKenshisSpirits.NAME: Kenshi's Spirits
TheKombatant:skillKenshisSpirits.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: [#F4D03F]Special[] thekombatant:Cancel. You may play a thekombatant:Kombo. NL Exhaust.

TheKombatant:skillIceKlone.NAME: Ice Klone
TheKombatant:skillIceKlone.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Next turn gain [E]. NL Exhaust.

TheKombatant:skillEnenra.NAME: Enenra
TheKombatant:skillEnenra.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Temporary Strength for each Attack played so far this turn. NL Exhaust. NL

TheKombatant:skillFaceReveal.NAME: Face Reveal
TheKombatant:skillFaceReveal.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! Kards. NL Take an Attack from your discard into hand. NL Exhaust.

TheKombatant:skillCyberInitiative.NAME: Cyber Initiative
TheKombatant:skillCyberInitiative.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust your hand, then draw that many kards. Upgrade your new hand, and add a copy of it to the draw pile. NL Exhaust.

TheKombatant:skillHellfire.NAME: Hellfire
TheKombatant:skillHellfire.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Whenever you are attacked this turn, apply !M! thekombatant:Toasty to the attacker.

TheKombatant:skillStealth.NAME: Stealth
TheKombatant:skillStealth.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Buffer. NL You will not be able to play attacks next turn. NL Exhaust.

TheKombatant:skillExtraShades.NAME: Extra Shades
TheKombatant:skillExtraShades.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. You may play a thekombatant:Kombo.

TheKombatant:skillDodgeJump.NAME: Jump In
TheKombatant:skillDodgeJump.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. You may play a thekombatant:Kombo.

TheKombatant:skillForceBubble.NAME: Force Bubble
TheKombatant:skillForceBubble.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Poison to an enemy. Gain !B! Block. NL thekombatant:EX: [#F4D03F]Special thekombatant:Cancel.

TheKombatant:skillSpear.NAME: Spear
TheKombatant:skillSpear.DESCRIPTION: Apply 2 Vulnerable. NL Return the top kard of the Discard into hand. NL Exhaust.
TheKombatant:skillSpear.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply 2 Vulnerable. NL Return the top !M! kards of the Discard into hand. NL Exhaust.

TheKombatant:skillFlameFists.NAME: Flaming Fists
TheKombatant:skillFlameFists.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! thekombatant:Toasty to an enemy that has thekombatant:Toasty.

TheKombatant:skillUndyingBlaze.NAME: Undying Blaze
TheKombatant:skillUndyingBlaze.DESCRIPTION: Prevents thekombatant:Toasty from being removed from an enemy at the end of the turn. NL Exhaust
TheKombatant:skillUndyingBlaze.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Prevents thekombatant:Toasty from being removed from an enemy at the end of the turn.

TheKombatant:skillRestand.NAME: Restand
TheKombatant:skillRestand.DESCRIPTION: thekombatant:Extender. NL Remove any Chained Power. NL Exhaust.
TheKombatant:skillRestand.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Remove any Chained Power. Remove any Weak and Frail as well. NL Exhaust.

TheKombatant:skillRunCancel.NAME: Run Kancel
TheKombatant:skillRunCancel.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: thekombatant:Kombo NL thekombatant:Extender. You may play another thekombatant:Kombo. NL Exhaust.

TheKombatant:skillReflect.NAME: Reflect
TheKombatant:skillReflect.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a kard. If you do, gain !B! Block.

TheKombatant:skillHighGarrote.NAME: High Garrote
TheKombatant:skillHighGarrote.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL The first time you are attacked this turn, the attacker takes !M! damage per hit.

TheKombatant:skillBreaker.NAME: Breaker
TheKombatant:skillBreaker.DESCRIPTION: Spend 2 Bars of Meter to gain 1 Buffer.

TheKombatant:skillWhiffPunish.NAME: Whiff Punish
TheKombatant:skillWhiffPunish.DESCRIPTION: If no enemy attacks you this turn, gain !M! Strength until the end of next turn.

TheKombatant:KombatUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
TheKombatant:KombatUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

TheKombatant:KombatRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
TheKombatant:KombatRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
TheKombatant:KombatRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

TheKombatant:KombatRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
TheKombatant:KombatRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

TheKombatant:KombatAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
TheKombatant:KombatAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage [E] times. NL (Deal !TheKombatant:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

TheKombatant:KombatSecondMagicNumberSkil.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
TheKombatant:KombatSecondMagicNumberSkil.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable and !TheKombatant:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.
